title: Your Geek in the Pink ğŸ¤“
message: I know you have difficult days sometimes, but I want to remind you how incredible you are. You are my everything and I missed you so much.

title: Happy Valentine's Day ğŸ’–
message: Wishing you a day filled with love and joy. You deserve all the happiness in the world. Forever mine.

title: Nayeon is Life ğŸ’˜
message: Just like your favorite music, you bring harmony and joy to my life every single day. Love you to the moon and back.

title: Opensource is Love ğŸ¤
message: Building things together, sharing our lives, and growing side by side. Thank you for being my partner in everything.

title: Love Countdown â³
message: Every second without you feels like an eternity, but every moment with you is a treasure I'll keep forever.

title: I'll Keep Building ğŸ› ï¸
message: I'll keep building this beautiful life with you, one detail at a time, just to see you smile. You're the best.
